results.text: እስከ ታወቀ ልክ ድረስ፡፡ መጠንነውም፤ ምን ያማርንም
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በውስጧም ከፍተኛዎችን ተራራዎች አደረግን፡፡ ጣፋጭ ውሃንም አጠጣናችሁ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
